snippet.title: Seven Doors Console Launch Trailer | Out now for all platforms
snippet.description:
Seven Doors | Out now for all platforms | PS, Switch, Xbox and Steam

Solves riddles and secret languages to overcome dangerous situations, and becomes part of a giant chess game. Atmosphere, mystery, and enigmas await you to surprise you and test your skills... Seven atmospheres, seven challenges, seven solutions. Will you reach the seventh door?

Seven Doors is out now! Please use the links below to order on your chosen platform...

Main landing page: https://www.soedesco.com/games/seven-doors

Nintendo: 

PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/nl-nl/product/EP4541-CUSA32324_00-SEVENDOORSEU0000

Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/seven-doors/9mt2j5z2phsq

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1329320/Seven_Doors/

Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/seven-doors-7039de

Follow SOEDESCO®!
Discord: https://discord.gg/soedesco
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/2wsfR4f
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/soedesco

Video editors: 
@furia_dev 
@juanfranrivero

About SOEDESCO:
#SOEDESCO is an independent video game developer, publisher, and distributor founded in 2002 by Soedesh Chauthi with its headquarters in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, and offices in Madrid, Spain & Pilsen, Czech Republic. We deliver creative content across multiple genres and platforms for a worldwide audience in physical and digital formats.

Our portfolio consists of titles such as #petitIsland, #lemoncake, #bunnypark, #airoheart, #monstercrown, #owlboy, #saintkotar , as well as original SOEDESCO IPs #truckdriver, #Adam’sVenture, #realfarm and #dollhouse.
